thread.title: RT - Daily news: Drone smashes into Boeing passenger plane during landing (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: RT - Daily news: Drone smashes into Boeing passenger plane during landing (PHOTOS)

author: RT
title: RT - Daily news: Drone smashes into Boeing passenger plane during landing (PHOTOS)
text:
Drone smashes into Boeing passenger plane during landing (PHOTOS) Published time: 7 Jan, 2017 14:23 Get short URL FILE PHOTO © Reuters A drone smashed into a Boeing plane with 80 passengers and 6 crew on board, causing substantial damage to the aircraft as it prepared to land at an airport in Mozambique. 
The Boeing 737-700 belonging to airline Linhas Aéreas de Moçambique (LAM) was operating a domestic flight when it was struck as it approached Tete airport, according to the Aviation Herald. 
The crew heard a loud bang but continued their approach, suspecting a bird had struck the plane. However, later examination revealed the damage was more substantial than initially thought and caused by an apparent drone collision. 
Photos shared online show alarming cracks at the front right of the fuselage. NEWS LAM #TM136 Boeing 737-700 was hit by a drone on approach to Tete, Mozambique https://t.co/74DtBLhYUU pic.twitter.com/29As14ZXFO 
LAM confirmed Thursday evening’s incident, saying that the damage resulted from a collision with ‘an external body.’ No one was injured in the incident. 
The airline said it will use a replacement aircraft while the plane is being repaired. LAM Mocambique Boeing 737-700 (C9-BAQ) #TM136 damaged nose near Tete airport after apparent drone collision https://t.co/2FrkMlgFvP pic.twitter.com/gLm77Kosvo
